• Mindscape ğŸ”¥

14. Other Classic ML Models (1)

NaÃ¯ve Bayes

NaÃ¯ve Bayes Models

  • ë¨¸ì‹ ëŸ¬ë‹ì—ì„œ ì•„ë§ˆë„ ê°€ì¥ ì¼ë°˜ì ì´ê³  ë‹¨ìˆœí•œ Bayesian network ëª¨ë¸
  • NaÃ¯ve Bayes(ë‚˜ì´ë¸Œ ë² ì´ì¦ˆ) ëª¨ë¸ì€ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ë³€ìˆ˜(class variable)ê°€ ì£¼ì–´ì¡Œì„ ë•Œ, íŠ¹ì • íŠ¹ì„±ì˜ ê°’ì´ ë‹¤ë¥¸ íŠ¹ì„±ì˜ ê°’ê³¼ (ì¡°ê±´ë¶€ì ìœ¼ë¡œ) independentí•˜ë‹¤ê³  ê°€ì •í•¨.
  • ì‹¤ì œë¡œëŠ” ì¡°ê±´ë¶€ ë…ë¦½ ê°€ì •ì´ ì—„ê²©í•˜ê²Œ ì‚¬ì‹¤ì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë”ë¼ë„ ì˜ ì‘ë™í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ê°€ ë§ìŒ.

Text Classification with NaÃ¯ve Bayes

  • í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë¶„ë¥˜ ì‘ì—…ì— NaÃ¯ve Bayes ëª¨ë¸ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²•
  • ì‘ì—…: ì£¼ì–´ì§„ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ ì–´ë–¤ classë‚˜ categoryì— ì†í•˜ëŠ”ì§€ ê²°ì •
  • "ì›ì¸" = Category\text{Category}Category ë³€ìˆ˜, "ê²°ê³¼" ë³€ìˆ˜ = íŠ¹ì • í‚¤ì›Œë“œì˜ ì¡´ì¬ ì—¬ë¶€ (HasWordi\text{HasWord}_iHasWordiâ€‹)
  • ì˜ˆì œ ë¬¸ì¥ (ì‹ ë¬¸ ê¸°ì‚¬)

    â€œStocks rallied on Monday, with major indexes gaining 1% as optimism persisted over the first quarter earnings season.â€ (business)
    â€œHeavy rain continued to pound much of the east coast on Monday, with flood warnings issued in New York City and other locations.â€ (weather)

  • ì‘ì—…: ê° ë¬¸ì¥ì„ ì£¼ìš” ì„¹ì…˜ (news, sports, business, weather, or entertainment)ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¶„ë¥˜
  • NaÃ¯ve Bayes ëª¨ë¸ì€ ì‚¬ì „ í™•ë¥ (prior probabilities) P(Category)P(\text{Category})P(Category)ì™€ ì¡°ê±´ë¶€ í™•ë¥ (conditional probabilities) P(HasWordiÂ âˆ£Â Category)P(\text{HasWord}_i~|~\text{Category})P(HasWordiâ€‹Â âˆ£Â Category)ë¡œ êµ¬ì„±
  • ì‚¬í›„ í™•ë¥ (Posterior probability)ì€ ì‚¬ì „ í™•ë¥ ê³¼ likelihood (ì¡°ê±´ë¶€ í™•ë¥ )ì˜ ê³±ì— ë¹„ë¡€

P(Categoryâˆ£HasWordw1,Â HasWordw2,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwn)=P(HasWordw1,Â HasWordw2,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwnâˆ£Category)P(Category)P(HasWordw1,Â HasWordw2,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwn)âˆP(HasWordw1,Â HasWordw2,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwnâˆ£Category)P(Category)=P(HasWordw1âˆ£Category)â‹¯P(HasWordwnâˆ£Category)P(Category)=âˆiP(HasWordwiâˆ£Category)P(Category)\begin{aligned} & P(\text{Category} | \text{HasWord}_{w1},~ \text{HasWord}_{w2},~ \dots,~ \text{HasWord}_{wn}) \\ & = \frac{P(\text{HasWord}_{w1},~ \text{HasWord}_{w2},~ \dots,~ \text{HasWord}_{wn} | \text{Category}) P(\text{Category})}{P(\text{HasWord}_{w1},~ \text{HasWord}_{w2},~ \dots,~ \text{HasWord}_{wn})} \\ & \propto P(\text{HasWord}_{w1},~ \text{HasWord}_{w2},~ \dots,~ \text{HasWord}_{wn} | \text{Category}) P(\text{Category}) \\ & = P(\text{HasWord}_{w1} | \text{Category}) \cdots P(\text{HasWord}_{wn} | \text{Category}) P(\text{Category}) \\ & = \prod_{i} P(\text{HasWord}_{wi} | \text{Category}) P(\text{Category}) \end{aligned} â€‹P(Categoryâˆ£HasWordw1â€‹,Â HasWordw2â€‹,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwnâ€‹)=P(HasWordw1â€‹,Â HasWordw2â€‹,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwnâ€‹)P(HasWordw1â€‹,Â HasWordw2â€‹,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwnâ€‹âˆ£Category)P(Category)â€‹âˆP(HasWordw1â€‹,Â HasWordw2â€‹,Â â€¦,Â HasWordwnâ€‹âˆ£Category)P(Category)=P(HasWordw1â€‹âˆ£Category)â‹¯P(HasWordwnâ€‹âˆ£Category)P(Category)=iâˆâ€‹P(HasWordwiâ€‹âˆ£Category)P(Category)â€‹

  • NaÃ¯ve Bayes ê°€ì •: ê° ë‹¨ì–´ì˜ ì¡´ì¬ëŠ” ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ê°€ ì£¼ì–´ì¡Œì„ ë•Œ ì¡°ê±´ë¶€ ë…ë¦½

A Decision Tree for Restaurant Waiting

LEARN-DECISION-TREE Algorithm

Choosing Attribute Tests

  • Decision tree learning algorithmì€ ê°€ì¥ ë†’ì€ IMPORTANCEë¥¼ ê°€ì§„ ì†ì„±ì„ ì„ íƒ
  • Entropy ê°œë…ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ì •ì˜ë˜ëŠ” information gainì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ IMPORTANCEë¥¼ ì¸¡ì •

Entropy ë³µìŠµ

  • Random variableì˜ ë¶ˆí™•ì‹¤ì„± ì²™ë„
  • ê°’ xxxê°€ í™•ë¥  P(x)P(x)P(x)ë¥¼ ê°–ëŠ” í™•ë¥ ë³€ìˆ˜ XXXì˜ ì—”íŠ¸ë¡œí”¼

H(X)=âˆ’âˆ‘xP(x)logâ¡2P(x)H(X) = -\sum_{x} P(x) \log_2 P(x) H(X)=âˆ’xâˆ‘â€‹P(x)log2â€‹P(x)

  • ê³µì •í•œ ë™ì „ ë˜ì§€ê¸° ì—”íŠ¸ë¡œí”¼ = 1 bit
  • í™•ë¥  qqqë¡œ trueì¸ boolean í™•ë¥ ë³€ìˆ˜ì˜ ì—”íŠ¸ë¡œí”¼ B(q)B(q)B(q):

B(q)=âˆ’(qlogâ¡2q+(1âˆ’q)logâ¡2(1âˆ’q))B(q) = -(q \log_2 q + (1-q) \log_2(1-q)) B(q)=âˆ’(qlog2â€‹q+(1âˆ’q)log2â€‹(1âˆ’q))

  • pppê°œì˜ positive exampleê³¼ nnnê°œì˜ negative exampleì„ í¬í•¨í•˜ëŠ” training setì—ì„œ, ì „ì²´ ì„¸íŠ¸ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì¶œë ¥ ë³€ìˆ˜ì˜ ì—”íŠ¸ë¡œí”¼

H(Output)=B(pp+n)H(Output) = B(\frac{p}{p+n}) H(Output)=B(p+npâ€‹)

  • ì‹ë‹¹ training set:
    • p=n=6p = n = 6p=n=6ì´ë¯€ë¡œ, í•´ë‹¹ ì—”íŠ¸ë¡œí”¼ëŠ” B(0.5)B(0.5)B(0.5) ì¦‰ 1 bit
  • ì†ì„± AAAì— ëŒ€í•œ í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ê²°ê³¼ëŠ” ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì œê³µí•˜ì—¬ ì „ì²´ ì—”íŠ¸ë¡œí”¼ë¥¼ ê°ì†Œì‹œí‚´
  • dddê°œì˜ ê³ ìœ í•œ ê°’ì„ ê°€ì§„ ì†ì„± AAAëŠ” training set EEEë¥¼ E1,Â â€¦,Â EdE_1,~\dots,~E_dE1â€‹,Â â€¦,Â Edâ€‹ ë¶€ë¶„ì§‘í•©(subsets)ìœ¼ë¡œ ë‚˜ëˆ”
